attributes.name: value
attributes.description: String representing selected time (and meridiem, if applicable)

attributes.name: use24HourTime
attributes.description: Setting indication whether this component will display and take user input in 24-hour time (0-23) or 12-hour time (AM/PM)

attributes.name: timeString
attributes.description: Hours and minutes represented as a string (i.e. the hh:mm) component of the time.

attributes.name: timePeriod
attributes.description: AM or PM, if this element instance is using 12-hour time.
